definition: Tokyo, capital of Japan/Tonkin (northern Vietnam during the French colonial period)
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)

sentences.english: Its Tochigi and Iwaki plants, north of Tokyo, would remain shut until Friday.
sentences.chinese: 位於東京北部櫪木和磐城的工廠將停產至週五。

sentences.english: It was unveiled by Tokyo Electric Power Chairman Tsuneihisa Katsumata.
sentences.chinese: 東京電力公司總裁清水正孝宣佈了這一計劃。

sentences.english: It was on show at the International Tokyo Toy Show.
sentences.chinese: 它曾在東京國際玩具展中展出。

sentences.english: He was headed for Tokyo Disneyland.
sentences.chinese: 他是衝着東京迪斯尼樂園去的。

sentences.english: You are that has enticed even time calling in Tokyo "the labor cane" the woman?
sentences.chinese: 誘惑了甚而時間叫在東京“辛苦藤莖”婦女的您是？

sentences.english: It has just come to our notice that the Japanese camera canon manufactured by seiki- kogaku, tokyo, is very popular.
sentences.chinese: 久聞東京精機光學廠生產的“佳能”照相機頗有名氣。

sentences.english: Yes, I want to go to Tokyo Tower, but l, m really lost.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我要去東京塔，可我迷路了。

sentences.english: Chiba Prefecture, Japan ABIKO a city, not far from Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: ABIKO是日本千葉縣的一個市，離東京不遠。

sentences.english: I tried sushi at Penang and Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 我曾嘗試壽司，在檳城和東京。

sentences.english: The train puffed towards Tokyo from Sendai.
Tepco and the safety agency say the exact source of the leak is unknown.
sentences.chinese: 東京電力和安全機構人士說，泄漏的確切來源不明。

sentences.english: In Tokyo window cleaners dress up as the animals of the Chinese zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 在東京，窗戶清潔工們打扮成了中國十二生肖的模樣。

sentences.english: We learned of your company through the Chamber of Commerce and Industry in Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 我們通過東京工商會了解貴公司。
東京股市將於今日重新開盤。

sentences.english: This Saturday night at eight thirty, all the lights will be shut off at the Tokyo Tower in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 本週六晚八點半，日本東京塔的所有燈光將會關閉。

sentences.english: In Tokyo, it's an envelope with $850,000 in cash.
sentences.chinese: 我字面翻譯是在東京，一個信封現金85萬美元。
